flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=30>>30
Mars weighs 50 tons because 150 / 0.3 = <<150/0.3=50>>50
The moon weighs 25 tons because 50 / 2 = <<50/2=25>>25
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 50. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
